summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Department of Transportation's Duwamish Intelligent Transportation Systems (ITS) project; authorizing the Director of Transportation to acquire and accept, on behalf of the City, permanent and temporary construction easements from the Port of Seattle, located in portions of Lots 14, 15, and 16, Block 426, Seattle Tide Lands, for the purpose of constructing, operating, maintaining, repairing, replacing, modifying, improving, removing, and using the easement areas for use of the conduit for underground electrical transmission and communications lines and Dynamic Message Sign (DMS) pole and base in connection with the Duwamish ITS project; and placing the real property conveyed by such easements under the jurisdiction of the Seattle Department of Transportation.
